ygData.subject: RE: Odd Behavior from the Maestro of Rancor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 36-41  15 standing, 17 sitting 42-47  17 standing, 19 sitting 48-50  19 standing, 21 sitting (I assume) So 20% sounds right.  Why don t you buy a normal
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 12 Jan 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> wait til you get the maestro with the 2 ERU/PAL only shields. what a
> complete waste of time. i have the lute too, my estimation was originally
> 20% but i think it could be 25 to 30% increase. whatever it is, i heal 25
> per tick sitting. isn't the normal 19?

36-41 15 standing, 17 sitting
42-47 17 standing, 19 sitting
48-50 19 standing, 21 sitting (I assume)

So 20% sounds right. Why don't you buy a normal lute and test
it? :)

--
John H. Kim
